en_US.description: The purpose of this mod is to compensate for the absence of certain quests planned by Bioware but never carried out, such as the kidnapping of Bouh. It also adds two profiles (Justice and Blood) kits and a few portraits.

components.0: The Kidnapping of Boo by Cliffette
components.2: Kalah and What He Was Promised
components.3: "Cat and Mouse" (Bodhi hunts you in Spellhold) by Ghreyfain
components.4: Gorje Hilldark and the Extended Illithium Quest
components.19: Restored Bhaalspawn Powers, by David Gaider
components.25: The Murder of Acton Balthis, by Kulyok

fr_FR.description: Ce mod a pour but de pallier l'absence de certaines quêtes prévues par Bioware et qui n'ont jamais été réalisées, comme l'enlèvement de Bouh. Il ajoute également deux profils (Justicier et Sanguinaire) kits et quelques portraits.

components.0: Le rapt de Bouh par Cliffette
components.2: Kalah et ce qui lui avait ete promis
components.3: "Le chat et la souris" (Bodhi vous pourchasse a Spellhold) par Ghreyfain
components.4: Gorje Hilldark et la quete de l'Illithium etendue
components.5: La quete de Pai'Na et du fleau des araignees
components.8: Artemis Entreri dans l'antre de Bodhi
components.10: Serviteurs des Enfers restaures, par SimDing0
components.17: Correction des noms de personnages et des biographies
components.19: Pouvoirs de Bhaal restaures, par David Gaider
components.20: Descriptions etendues des objets de ToB
components.21: Corrections mineures de Throne of Bhaal
components.25: Le meurtre d'Acton Balthis, par Kulyok

components.0: The Kidnapping of Boo by Cliffette
components.2: Kalah and What He Was Promised
components.3: "Cat and Mouse" (Bodhi hunts you in Spellhold) by Ghreyfain
components.4: Gorje Hilldark and the Extended Illithium Quest
components.19: Restored Bhaalspawn Powers, by David Gaider

components.0: Il furto di Boo di Cliffette
components.2: Kalah e cio' che gli era stato promesso
components.3: "Gatto e Topo" (Bodhi ti da' la caccia a Spellhold) di Ghreyfain
components.4: Gorje Hilldark e l'ampliamento della missione dell'Illithium
components.8: Artemis Entreri nel covo di Bodhi
components.10: Reintegrate le abilità dei Demoni nell'Abisso di SimDing0
components.17: Corretti i nomi di alcuni personaggi
components.19: Reintegrate capacità della Progenie di Bhaal di David Gaider
components.20: Estesa la descrizione degli oggetti di ToB
components.21: Reintegra contenuti minori di Throne of Bhaal
components.25: The Murder of Acton Balthis, by Kulyok

zh_CN.description: 此模组旨在弥补BioWare计划中从未实现的一些任务的缺失，例如布布的绑架事件。它还添加了两个职业配置（复仇者和嗜血者）和一些肖像。

components.1: 恢复苏娜·塞妮与瓦里格的关系
components.3: “猫和老鼠”（芭荻在禁魔监狱中追杀你）
components.4: 高杰·希尔达克与扩充的伊利希银任务
components.8: 阿提密斯·恩崔立出现在芭荻巢穴
components.10: 恢复地狱中艾瑞尼卡斯之战的喽罗
components.17: 正确的人物名称和特性
components.19: 恢复巴尔之子的特殊能力
components.25: 艾克顿·巴西斯谋杀案 作者：Kulyok

components.2: Kalah i To Co Bylo Mu Obiecane

components.4: Gorje Ciemne Wzgórze i rozszerzone poszukiwania Ilitu
components.19: Przywrocone Moce Bhaala, autorstwa David Gaider
